alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 2:35PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Worcester, east central Hampshire and southeastern Franklin Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Salem, or 11 miles east of Amherst, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Orange, Gardner, Belchertown, Athol, Winchendon, Ware, Templeton, Ashburnham, Barre, Hubbardston, Hardwick, Shutesbury, Phillipston, Pelham, Royalston, Petersham and New Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
